title: 5Ksana_HandMade
author: 5Ksana_HandMade
content: My name is Aksana (5Ksana) – NFTartist, HANDcrafted wizard BITCOINART and Fashion designer.I want to address to all artists, friends and the community BITCOIN.I live in Belarus, where the situation is extremely difficult for everyone now.I always dream to create a store-bitcoinart where I would create my physical artworks and designer clothes. But in my country this is not possible. I can do this in another country, but for this I need financial help.Through my art, I will popularize Bitcoin, because Bitcoin is the idea of ​​absolute freedom!My physical artworks BITCOINART https://5ksana.art/category/bitcoinart/DONATE - bitcoin crowdfunding BTC  https://tallycoin.app/@5ksana/help-free-artist-bitcoinart-zdNKO6dy/
